Message.Msg: FB is bloated and GRPN is a dog. Your post is so factually inaccurate that I do not know where to begin. First of all, IBM stated a goal of $20 of EARNINGS by 2015 and they are well ahead of schedule. Yes, the stock was at $100 when IBM was earning less than $10 per share. In 2012 they will earn $15 and by 2015 IBM will earn $20. Secondly, IBM will more than double their earnings in 5 years. I will let you do the math on the EPS growth rate YOY%. if you do the math correctly, then a logical conclusion is that IBM is slightly undervalued at $195, and not expensive. I am a long term shareholder and not greedy at all. Yes, the world is changing and IBM is a leader of that change. That is about the only sensible item from your post. If you think IBM is a dog, then do a chart comparison with the DJIA or the S&P500. You will see IBM is a leader...

Topic.Title: New message board. You're kidding us, right?

Topic.Title: New message board. You're kidding us, right?

Message.Msg: Looks like we are stuck with a "new and improved" crappy system qofaslave69. Now if we post the articles in their entirety we'll probably be open to copyright violations. Noticed it also doesn't keep line feeds and compresses everything. Yahoo's position: Sorry. To prevent spam, URLs are not allowed in messages While there are no plans to return to our classic style, we are constantly working on this platform to improve your customer experience. For that feedback, we count on customers, such as you, to tell us what you'd like to see in future versions of the Yahoo! Finance Message Boards. If you have suggestions for our Yahoo! Finance team, please send a message to our Feedback Forum. **Testing**Testing** URL worldwideweb bloomberg dot com /video/watson-crunching-data-for-wellpoint-citigroup-PnTXsTjrSIWJW6kJFiczQg.html?cmpid=yhoo
